title: Don Orsillo Vs. Red Sox
description:
Both sidekicks are in today as Blind Mike and Chris Klemmer find a new favorite consignment shop at "Alfred's Consignments" in Warren,RI. (5:40) After his outrageous call yesterday, Kirk has Kevin From Bristol call in to make sure no blood ends up on his hands. (18:10) The Red Sox are in the middle of controversy with Don Orsillo, as Don's video was absent from the Jerry Remy tribute last night, and Kirk doesn't know who is more in the wrong. (25:10) Big changes are headed to WEEI as the big announcement yesterday was the addition of Meghan Ottolini to Merloni & Fauria on the afternoon drive program. (44:50) Justin asks for a job as an associate producer. (1:01:30) Kirk and Mike draft their all time WEEI lineup in today's game, Kirk's old Latin teacher calls in and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
